Been playing CounterStrike since it's beta been released back in 1999. It's been thousands of hours. Was it worth it? Did I spend my time well? *Shoulder shrug* I can not not recommend it. Your life, your choice. Choose wisely and enjoy the journey for life is too short to regret it. Whatever that may mean to you. I wish you a fulfilled life.

Casual and especially non-prime gaming is full of cheaters, but when you are powering through that brick, CSGO is an addictive tactical shooter experience providing possibly hundreds and thousands of hours of playtime.
